name: Edgy Boy in Space
description:
Controls

A/D - Walk
Mouse 1 Click - Attack
Mouse 1 Long Press - Dash Attack
Mouse 2 Click - Dash

An Edgy Boy with a very large blade sets out to deliver justice, In Space!

This game was meant to be a puzzle platformer, in which you'd chain strikes, dodges, parries and ripostes while fighting through the rooms of a shadowy corporation, attempting to solve defeat every enemy while drawing your blade only once.  Alas, life caught up with us, and our product did not match our grand vision 😤

This game is a submission for Jame Gam #9, with the theme of Only One, with a special item of a Chain. For this project, both theme and item were meant to be expressed through gameplay. While this design might be revisited in the future, for now it shall remain a prototype.

Credits

Art and animation - @explorermoo
Game and level design - @lobbamattos
Programming - @romuboy
Industrial Tileset - https://atomicrealm.itch.io/industrial-tileset
UI Elements - https://wenrexa.itch.io/holoui
Metropolitan City Parallax - https://maelstrion.itch.io/metropolitan-city-parallax-background

This prototype has been made in Unity (https://unity3d.com/), stages made with Tiled (https://www.mapeditor.org/), and upscaled with Online XBR Pixel Art Upscaler (https://www.maxlaumeister.com/pixel-art-upscaler/)
